title: Salinas Pueblo Missions National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility           All four sites are partially wheelchair accessible. The trails are hard-surfaced. Handicapped restrooms are available at all sites. Special Needs: Braille text available on request at each unit. A captioned AV program is available at headquarters. Parking areas are designated and designed for special needs vehicles.  There are wheelchairs available at the visitor centers, which are loaned on a first-come basis.
